thread.title_full: ‘Little Big Shots’ Sneak Peek: Amazing Acrobats

title: ‘Little Big Shots’ Sneak Peek: Amazing Acrobats
text: Tweet Share Imagine if the amazing, eye-popping feats of Cirque du Soleil were performed by little kids. Meet Le Petit Cirque! The troupe of young acrobats, dancers, and contortionists features kids ranging in age from six to 14. They’ve performed all over the world, including for the Dalai Lama and at the Nobel Peace Prize concert with Sting, and they are the new faces of Gap Kids. In this sneak peek from Little Big Shots , their stunning aerial act makes host Steve Harvey and the audience’s jaws drop. And they can’t take their eyes off the impossibly cute Declan Whaley, a national champion martial artist who also acts. Perhaps you saw him in Criminal Minds: Beyond Borders and on Nickelodeon’s School of Rock . Declan cartwheels into the action and proves he’s quite handy with a sword. He may be small in size, but not short on fierceness! Little Big Shots airs Sundays at 8 p.m. on NBC. Read more from Yahoo TV:
